institution_id.MOHC: Met Office Hadley Centre, Fitzroy Road, Exeter, Devon, EX1 3PB, UK

HadGEM3-GC31-LL.source:
HadGEM3-GC31-LL (2016): 
aerosol: UKCA-GLOMAP-mode
atmos: MetUM-HadGEM3-GA7.1 (N96; 192 x 144 longitude/latitude; 85 levels; top level 85 km)
atmosChem: none
land: JULES-HadGEM3-GL7.1
landIce: none
ocean: NEMO-HadGEM3-GO6.0 (eORCA1 tripolar primarily 1 deg with meridional refinement down to 1/3 degree in the tropics; 360 x 330 longitude/latitude; 75 levels; top grid cell 0-1 m)
ocnBgchem: none
seaIce: CICE-HadGEM3-GSI8 (eORCA1 tripolar primarily 1 deg; 360 x 330 longitude/latitude)

HadGEM3-GC31-MM.source:
HadGEM3-GC31-MM (2016): 
aerosol: UKCA-GLOMAP-mode
atmos: MetUM-HadGEM3-GA7.1 (N216; 432 x 324 longitude/latitude; 85 levels; top level 85 km)
atmosChem: none
land: JULES-HadGEM3-GL7.1
landIce: none
ocean: NEMO-HadGEM3-GO6.0 (eORCA025 tripolar primarily 0.25 deg; 1440 x 1205 longitude/latitude; 75 levels; top grid cell 0-1 m)
ocnBgchem: none
seaIce: CICE-HadGEM3-GSI8 (eORCA025 tripolar primarily 0.25 deg; 1440 x 1205 longitude/latitude)

source_type.AER: aerosol treatment in an atmospheric model where concentrations are calculated based on emissions, transformation, and removal processes (rather than being prescribed or omitted entirely)
source_type.AGCM: atmospheric general circulation model run with prescribed ocean surface conditions and usually a model of the land surface
source_type.AOGCM: coupled atmosphere-ocean global climate model, additionally including explicit representation of at least the land and sea ice
source_type.BGC: biogeochemistry model component that at the very least accounts for carbon reservoirs and fluxes in the atmosphere, terrestrial biosphere, and ocean
source_type.CHEM: chemistry treatment in an atmospheric model that calculates atmospheric oxidant concentrations (including at least ozone), rather than prescribing them
source_type.LAND: land model run uncoupled from the atmosphere
source_type.OGCM: ocean general circulation model run uncoupled from an AGCM but, usually including a sea-ice model
source_type.RAD: radiation component of an atmospheric model run 'offline'
source_type.SLAB: slab-ocean used with an AGCM in representing the atmosphere-ocean coupled system

frequency.1hrCM: monthly-mean diurnal cycle resolving each day into 1-hour means
frequency.1hrPt: sampled hourly, at specified time point within an hour
frequency.3hrPt: sampled 3 hourly, at specified time point within the time period
frequency.6hrPt: sampled 6 hourly, at specified time point within the time period
frequency.monC: monthly climatology computed from monthly mean samples
frequency.monPt: sampled monthly, at specified time point within the time period
frequency.subhrPt: sampled sub-hourly, at specified time point within an hour
frequency.yrPt: sampled yearly, at specified time point within the time period

grid_label.gn: data reported on a model's native grid
grid_label.gna: data reported on a native grid in the region of Antarctica
grid_label.gng: data reported on a native grid in the region of Greenland
grid_label.gnz: zonal mean data reported on a model's native latitude grid
grid_label.gr: regridded data reported on the data provider's preferred target grid
grid_label.gr1: regridded data reported on a grid other than the native grid and other than the preferred target grid
grid_label.gr1a: regridded data reported in the region of Antarctica on a grid other than the native grid and other than the preferred target grid
grid_label.gr1g: regridded data reported in the region of Greenland on a grid other than the native grid and other than the preferred target grid
grid_label.gr1z: regridded zonal mean data reported on a grid other than the native latitude grid and other than the preferred latitude target grid
